name: Card Artisan Pre Alpha 0.01.19
description:
Card Artisan is a card battler with RPG elements that allows you to not only create your own deck but also create your own custom cards.

Not two runs are the same since every card you obtain past your starter deck is fully randomized, and with easy to use integrated tools to create your own mods or community-made mods, the possibilities are endless.

As the name implies, Card Artisan allows you to create your own cards. Whenever you defeat an enemy or encounter treasure, you can obtain crafting materials that can be used to make every part of your custom-made cards; from the attack and resistance of your minions to the activation conditions and effects of your card abilities!

Other minor elements are also present like town building, and other other elements are planned like a more deep story involving resolving the quarrel of neighboring kingdoms.
